CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 7, 1956, page 21, reads: "1. Pointing to the grand prize in the Crosley-Bendix dealers' booth are Saul B. Pearlstein, Shirley T. Pearlstein, Herb Gold, Mrs. Daisy E. Lampkin, Courier vice president; Maurice Linden and F. Linden..."
TitMainTitle: Saul B. Pearlstein, Shirley T. Pearlstein, Herb Gold, Mrs. Daisy E. Lampkin, Maurice Linden, and F. Linden gathered around grand prize in the Crosley-Bendix dealers' booth, in Syria Mosque for the 1956 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
CatSubject_tab: Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair.Signs--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Advertising--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Syria Mosque (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Lampkin, Daisy E. (Daisy Elizabeth), 1882-1965.
